Bash(# ワークフローの整理（最新成功版のみ残す）
mkdir -p archive/workflows/old-versions
for file in .github/workflows/*.yml; do
  filename=$(basename ""$file"")
  if [[ ! ""$filename"" =~ (meta-workflow-executor-v11\.yml|dynamic-workflow-60-v10\.yml|video-content-creation-production-v8\.yml) ]]; then
    mv ""$file"" archive/workflows/old-versions/
  fi
done)

Bash(# 古いワークフローを削除
rm -rf archive/workflows/)

Bash(# ルートディレクトリの成果物を移動
mkdir -p projects/current-session/final
mv final-video-with-audio.mp4 projects/current-session/final/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv final-video.mp4 projects/current-session/final/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv lipsync-processing-log.txt projects/current-session/final/ 2>/dev/null || true)

Bash(# projects/ディレクトリの整理
mkdir -p projects/archive/2024-08
mkdir -p projects/test-runs
mkdir -p projects/production

# 古い実行結果をアーカイブ
mv projects/autophagy-video-* projects/archive/2024-08/ 2>/dev/null || true

# テスト実行結果を移動
mv projects/simple-test-result projects/test-runs/ 2>/dev/null || true

# 本番実行結果を整理
mv projects/issue-62-results-latest projects/production/issue-62 2>/dev/null || true
mv projects/issue-62-* projects/archive/2024-08/ 2>/dev/null || true

# dynamic-workflow-60の最新版だけ残す
mv projects/dynamic-workflow-60-v10-artifacts projects/production/dynamic-workflow-60 2>/dev/null || true
mv projects/dynamic-workflow-60-* projects/archive/2024-08/ 2>/dev/null || true)

Bash(# deprecated スクリプトをアーカイブ
mkdir -p archive/deprecated
mv scripts/deprecated archive/deprecated/scripts 2>/dev/null || true)

Bash(# 最終状態確認
echo ""=== ワークフロー整理結果 ===""
ls -la .github/workflows/*.yml | wc -l
echo """"
echo ""=== projects/ディレクトリ構造 ===""
ls -la projects/
echo """"
echo ""=== archive/ディレクトリ ===""
ls -la archive/)
